attributes.action: Reinstate Winter Fuel Payments for Pensioners
attributes.additional_details:
Request

We urge the government to:
	•	Reinstate winter fuel payments for all eligible pensioners.
attributes.background: call on the UK Government to reinstate winter fuel payments for pensioners. The removal of these payments has placed undue financial strain on elderly people, especially with rising energy costs

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for a similar action: 

Reverse changes to Winter Fuel Payment: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700074
